data.comment: The referee blows his whistle to start the first-half. Norwich with the kick-off.
Ivan Toney puts the ball in the net and the home team now lead 1-0.
In the minute 45, The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
Brentford kick-off the second-half u- the match is underway again!
Przemyslaw Placheta is on a sub for Todd Cantwell for Norwich.
In the minute 59, Thomas Frank (Brentford) is making a first substitution, with Sergi Canos replacing Saman Ghoddos.
Kenny McLean is replacing Oliver Skipp for the away team.
Jordan Hugill is replacing Lukas Rupp for Norwich at Griffin Park.
In the minute 70, The home team replace Joshua Da Silva with Vitaly Janelt.
Ben Gibson (Norwich) has received a yellow card from Jeremy Simpson.
At Griffin Park, Vitaly Janelt has been yellow-carded for the home team.
In the minute 83, Thomas Frank is making the team's third substitution at Griffin Park with Marcus Forss replacing Ivan Toney.
Goal! Kenny McLean levels the match at 1-1.
